A slice of birthday cake is an item available during some of Old School RuneScape's birthday events by taking a slice off the birthday cake. Eating the cake heals 3 hitpoints. This item can not be banked.

  • During Old School RuneScape's first birthday, it was blue in colour, and was available by taking a slice off the birthday cake in Prifddinas.
  • During Old School RuneScape's second birthday, it was available by taking a slice off the birthday cake in Varrock Square, although the colour of the cake has been changed to yellow.
  • During Old School RuneScape's fifth birthday, it was available by taking a slice off the birthday cake in the Falador Party Room, although the colour of the cake has been changed to purple, adding alongside decorations of runes.
  • During Old School RuneScape's seventh birthday, it was available by taking a slice off the birthday cake in Juliet's house. The cake has the same appearance as in 2018.

  • Old School RuneScape's first birthday cake.

  • Old School RuneScape's second birthday cake.

  • Old School RuneScape's fifth birthday cake.

(update)

The 2018 version's "Eat" option was removed.

26 February 2015
(update)
  • The 2015 version's value was decreased from 30 to 1.
  • The 2015 version's "Eat" option was removed.

A '''slice of birthday cake''' is an item available during some of ''[[Old School RuneScape]]'s'' [[birthday event]]s by taking a slice off the birthday cake. Eating the cake heals 3 [[hitpoints]]. This item can not be banked.

*During ''Old School RuneScape's'' [[2014 Birthday event|first birthday]], it was blue in colour, and was available by taking a slice off the birthday cake in [[Prifddinas]].
*During ''Old School RuneScape's'' [[2015 Birthday event|second birthday]], it was available by taking a slice off the birthday cake in [[Varrock Square]], although the colour of the cake has been changed to yellow.
*During ''Old School RuneScape's'' [[2018 Birthday event|fifth birthday]], it was available by taking a slice off the birthday cake in the [[Falador Party Room]], although the colour of the cake has been changed to purple, adding alongside decorations of runes.
*During ''Old School RuneScape's'' [[2020 Birthday event|seventh birthday]], it was available by taking a slice off the birthday cake in Juliet's house. The cake has the same appearance as in 2018.

2014 Birthday event.png|Old School RuneScape's first birthday cake.
